news_items.title: Work in local government
news_items.description: Help to make your community a safer, healthier and happier place to live and work, with a career that offers great benefits, support and flexible working. You can really make a difference when you start a career with a council.

news_items.title: Weekly food and garden waste collections set to launch in Hull
news_items.description: From Tuesday 31 March 2026, the majority of households across Hull will receive weekly brown bin and outdoor food caddy collections, doubling the frequency of the current fortnightly service.

news_items.title: Thousands attend more than 240 Healthy Holidays activities this winter
news_items.description: The latest Healthy Holidays Hull winter programme has been a fantastic success, reaching 5,185 children, young people, and families across the city during the winter break.

news_items.title: Financial help and support
news_items.description: With so many forms, rules and systems it can be difficult to know where to begin, but there is free, confidential advice available which is easily accessed and can help make a difference.
